markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Siabrae](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1898)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A siabrae is a determined and merciless foe, bound by a twisted sense of duty to nature so strong that it drove them to commit unspeakable acts and arise as an undead menace.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Siabrae.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Siabrae](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1898)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 145</row>

**Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +33, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +29, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** +4

**Wis** +9

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
_scroll of [true seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)_, [_staff of nature's vengeance_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=749)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +28 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +31 

</row>

**HP** 218
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 20, physical 15 (except [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) bludgeoning)

**Miasma** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 20 feet, DC 37

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 25 feet, earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stone antler +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 5d6+12 bludgeoning plus stony shards

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 41, attack +33
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175), [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
- **2nd**
[Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299), [Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)
- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
- **4th**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Rusting Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=711), [Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290)
- **5th**
[Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343)
- **6th**
[Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) (×2), [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)
- **7th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116)
- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224)

**Druid Order Spells** DC 41, 3 Focus Points
- **7th**
[Wild Morph](/Spells.aspx?ID=480), [Wild Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) (any form from [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10), [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98), [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=163), [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217), [_plant shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223), or [_soaring shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=4))

**Blight Mastery**   

**Steady Spellcasting**   If a reaction would disrupt the siabrae's spellcasting action, the siabrae attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

**Stony Shards**  ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) DC 37

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-310" />
name: Siabrae
